entry.title: Feedback sought
entry.summary: I've been trying to update the docs for Type::Tiny and want feedback. Is there anything that's hard to understand, or needs explaining more? New version Old version In particular, it's Type::Tiny::Manual and the other pod pages in that namespace that...
entry.content:
I've been trying to update the docs for Type::Tiny and want feedback. Is there anything that's hard to understand, or needs explaining more?

  • New version
  • Old version

In particular, it's Type::Tiny::Manual and the other pod pages in that namespace that I'm working on.
